description: The trap will be generated when Core LB member is in service.

event.Summary: Core LB member $v4 is in service

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APCORELB-MIB::apCoreLBMemberInServiceTrap APCORELB-MIB::apCoreLBMemberAddressType i 0 APCORELB-MIB::apCoreLBMemberAddress s EXAMPLE APCORELB-MIB::apCoreLBMemberPort u 9999 APCORELB-MIB::apCoreLBMemberId s EXAMPLE

description: This is the IP address type of Core LB member.
variables.name: APCORELB-MIB::apCoreLBMemberAddressType

description: This is the IP address of Core LB member.
variables.name: APCORELB-MIB::apCoreLBMemberAddress

description: This is the port of Core LB member.
variables.name: APCORELB-MIB::apCoreLBMemberPort

description: This is the Id of Core LB member.
variables.name: APCORELB-MIB::apCoreLBMemberId

description: The trap will be generated when Core LB member is out of service.

event.Summary: Core LB member $v4 out of service due to $v5

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APCORELB-MIB::apCoreLBMemberOOSTrap APCORELB-MIB::apCoreLBMemberAddressType i 0 APCORELB-MIB::apCoreLBMemberAddress s EXAMPLE APCORELB-MIB::apCoreLBMemberPort u 9999 APCORELB-MIB::apCoreLBMemberId s EXAMPLE APCORELB-MIB::apCoreLBReasonCode i 0

description: This is the IP address type of Core LB member.
variables.name: APCORELB-MIB::apCoreLBMemberAddressType

description: This is the IP address of Core LB member.
variables.name: APCORELB-MIB::apCoreLBMemberAddress

description: This is the port of Core LB member.
variables.name: APCORELB-MIB::apCoreLBMemberPort

description: This is the Id of Core LB member.
variables.name: APCORELB-MIB::apCoreLBMemberId

description: The reason for the Core LB member to go OOS.
variables.name: APCORELB-MIB::apCoreLBReasonCode
